title.rendered: Critical Banana Smoothie 5 Pack + 5 FREE MAC Muffin Feminized Seeds | Photoperiod Promo Pack*

content.rendered:
Introducing The Tastebudz Photoperiod Promo Pack: Elevate Your Cannabis Collection

5 X Critical Banana Smoothie Cannabis Seeds & 5 X Mac Muffin Cannabis Seeds

Unveiling the epitome of tropical indulgence, Tastebudz presents Critical Banana Smoothie Feminized Cannabis Seeds. Crafted from a fusion of Banana Punch and Critical strains, these seeds promise an exquisite journey of flavour and relaxation. Here’s why they’re a must-have for any grower:

🌴 Exotic Flavour Fusion: Immerse yourself in the tantalizing blend of ripe bananas, zesty citrus, and creamy coconut. With every puff, the tropical symphony of flavours transports you to a blissful paradise.

🧘‍♂️ Tranquil Indica High: Experience serenity as the calming effects of this hybrid strain gently envelop your body and mind. Ideal for unwinding after a long day or seeking inspiration in creative endeavours.

💰 Bountiful Yields: Whether indoors or outdoors, these seeds yield luscious plants with ease, offering up to 550 gr/m2 indoors and a whopping 1000 gr/plant outdoors in just 8-9 weeks.

🔥 Potent Profile: With a THC content of 25% and a terpene profile including Alpha-pinene, Linalool, and D-Limonene, Tastebudz Critical Banana Smoothie Feminized Cannabis Seeds deliver a potent and aromatic experience.

🎁 Sold as Souvenirs: Please note that Tastebudz seeds are sold as souvenirs only in accordance with UK laws. Visit our list of Official Tastebudz Seeds Distributors to find a shop near you and acquire these irresistible seeds today! 🌱

🎁 Special Bonus: Mac Muffin Feminized Cannabis Seeds

As an added bonus, each Photoperiod Promo Pack includes 5 free Mac Muffin Feminized Cannabis Seeds, enhancing your collection with even more premium genetics. Let’s delve into the delightful details of Mac Muffin:

🧁 Indulge in Blissful Relaxation: Tastebudz MAC Muffin offers a seamless blend of mental clarity and physical relaxation, perfect for any time of day. With THC levels reaching 22%, this strain ensures a tranquil experience without incapacitation.

🌟 Exceptional Yield and Quality: Enjoy generous yields of top-quality flower, accompanied by a complex cannabinoid profile and exceptional resistance to mold. Indoors, expect yields of 500-600 gr/m2, while outdoors, reap rewards of 1300-2000 gr/plant.

👅 Unforgettable Flavour Journey: From subtle earthy fruit notes to a burst of sugar-coated blueberry tartness, Tastebudz MAC Muffin tantalizes your taste buds with an unforgettable experience.

🌍 Available Worldwide: Tastebudz MAC Muffin seeds are available from Seedbanks worldwide, we also take card payments online!

Disclaimer

Buying, selling, or trading feminized cannabis seeds in the UK is legally permissible, regardless of whether seeds are obtained domestically or from other European countries. However, it is your responsibility to research and comply with local laws and regulations before placing an order. All Tastebudz seeds sold as souvenirs only in full alignment wit UK laws.
